Package index

Functions

you will call these to get American Community Survey data

build_api_variable()
Vectorized Creation of Census ACS Variables
build_api_url()
Create an API call to send to api.census.gov
build_for_geographies()
Use the for geography to specify the level that you are querying data for.
build_in_geographies()
Create the part of a Census API query that describes containing geographies
build_info_url()
Get the URL for JSON metadata about one table of ACS data
fetch_acs5_tract_data()
Pull data from the 5-year American Community Survey
fetch_data()
Download a set of data from the US Census API
fetch_decennial_block_pops_by_race()
Get decennial census estimates of per-block populations by race/ethnicity
fetch_json_as_list()
Make a call to the Census API and convert the JSON response to an R list.
fetch_metadata_table()
Fetch metadata about a specific ACS data set from the Census API.
hercacstables
Tools for parsing ACS data tables
json_list_to_frame()
Convert a list of json objects from the census into a data frame
margins_by_demography_and_place()
Determine the relative contribution of different demographic groups to the populations of a set of areas.
pivot_and_separate()
Take a wide-formatted response from the Census API and convert it to long
safe_api_query()
Split a census query into fewer than 50 variables per query

Metadata

These tables connect real-world meanings to the table-name-row-number codes that you need to pull data from the Census API.

CHILDREN_IN_POVERTY_METADATA
Categorize ACS variables about children living in poverty and parents' birth origins
CHILDREN_PER_FAMILY_METADATA
Categorize ACS variables about children per family
DECENNIAL_POPULATION_FIELDS
Variables from the Decennial censuses
EDUCATIONAL_ATTAINMENT_LEVELS
Census labels for different levels of educational achievement
EDUCATIONAL_ATTAINMENT_METADATA
Census variables for different levels of educational achievement
EMPLOYMENT_STATUS_METADATA
Factor values associated with specific rows within employment-related ACS tables
FAMILIES_WITH_CHILDREN_METADATA
Categorize ACS variables counting families by number of children
GEOGRAPHY_HIERARCHY_METADATA
Geographic levels of organization for data from the US Census Bureau's API
METADATA_ACS5
Group, Variable, and Geography information for the latest 5-Year ACS
RACE_ETHNICITY_SUBTABLE_METADATA
Race and ethnicity codes and labels used by the U.S. Census Bureau
STANDARD_OF_LIVING_METADATA
Categorize ACS variables about income : poverty level ratios by family sustainability
